State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: This mod allows preload F4SE plugins before the game initializes.
State.Name: xSE PluginPreloader F4

Original.Name: 4estGimp - M8r's Complex Item Sorter Enhancements II-51307-2-5-1654289770.7z

State.Author: 4estGimp
State.Description:
*Intended for a No-AWKCR build*

This mod is a collection of Quality of Life additions for M8r98a4f2's Complex Item Sorter.  It expands Icons, Item Sorting, and Rule-sets.  The Mod Manager download includes the 3 main Complex Sorter .ini files and 3 Inventory Sorting .xml files.  It works great alone or along with my other FallUI mods.
State.Name: 4estGimp - M8r98a4f2's Complex Item Sorter Enhancements

State.Author: Wolfmark
State.Description:
Shows on HUD widgets for active effects.

Also modifies Pip-Boy Stat page to add two new tabs, one for the active effects and one for player's actor values.

Provides few additional HUD widgets: Clock, Counters, Inventory Weight and Explosives.



See the screenshots for details.
State.Name: Active Effects on HUD

Original.Name: Atom Cats Drag Race Start Fix-60137-1-0-1651412553.zip

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: Did you know that there's a drag race going on at the Atom Cats Garage? Too bad it's already over before you even get close to it. This mod fixes it.
State.Name: Atom Cats Drag Race Start Fix

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description: Monitors your save file for data loss and warns you when you load the game, so you can avoid wasting time playing on a busted save and roll back immediately.
State.Name: Canary Save File Monitor

State.Author: a1a3a6a9
State.Description: Get items from ESPs anad ESLs in-game, no more console, FormID and ALT+TAB. Mostly Maintenance builds.
State.Name: DavesMods - In Game ESP Explorer Maintenance

State.Author: LucidLady - robotized
State.Description: Just a few very simple edits that fix Deirdre.
State.Name: Deirdre Bugfix

State.Author: reg2k and Neanka
State.Description: The Extended Dialogue Interface removes the hardcoded 4-option limit on dialogue and adds full engine support for any number of player dialogue options.
State.Name: Extended Dialogue Interface

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description:
Overhaul of the sleeping and waiting menu for Fallout 4. 

Directly click on your desired wake-up time with target time buttons. See the daylight level at target time in the daytime graph and more. Interface available in all languages.
State.Name: FallUI - Sleep and Wait

Original.Name: MTM - FH Cliffs Edge Hotel Wall Fix - ESL-40230-1-0-1564041140.7z

State.Author: MrTroubleMaker
State.Description: Rotates the HotelRestRingLowerA mesh by 40 degrees to fix its position.
State.Name: Far Harbor - Cliffs Edge Hotel Wall Rest Ring Lower Fixed

Original.Name: MTM - Fens Parkview Apartment Wall Fixed - ESL-40553-1-0-1567578166.7z

State.Author: MrTroubleMaker
State.Description:
Fixes the receptionist ceiling at Slocum Joe Corporate HQ



Bonus!



Fixes the Fens Parkview Apartment Wall
State.Name: Slocum Joe Corporate HQ Reception Ceiling Fixed

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This mod fixes the flickering water puddles - without disabling their reflection and specularity! And takes care of blood puddles too. Comes with an installer, packed or loose files, esl flagged esp.
State.Name: Fixed flickering puddles

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: HUDFramework is a UI framework that makes it possible for mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.
State.Name: HUDFramework

State.Author: Locnlol
State.Description: Gives the legendary radroach the special effect it was always meant to have.
State.Name: Legendary Radroach Fix

State.Author: Lively
State.Description: Keyword resource. Literally nothing but keywords.
State.Name: Lively's Keyword Resource

State.Author: Gozer
State.Description: Patches for weapons to be used with "Lively's Keyword Resource" by Livelynightmare AKA Lively, and "Standalone Workbenches" by bionicyardiff AKA Whisper.
State.Name: LKR and WSW Weapon Patches

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!
State.Name: MCM Settings Manager

State.Author: Bradster
State.Description: The MIRV seemed broken, so I made some adjustments that I believe make it better.
State.Name: MIRV fix

State.Author: Glass and SMB92
State.Description:
Add a little life to your game.

This mod increases the number "active" AI in large settlements, large battles and more!

Works great as a companion mod to Sim Settlements and other spawn mods.
State.Name: More Active AI

Original.Name: MTM - Nuka Town East Archway Fix - ESL-40513-1-0-1565157755.7z

State.Author: MrTroubleMaker
State.Description:
Fixes the East Entrance to Nuka-Town USA near Fizztop Mountain



Bonus! 



Fixes the ceiling by the broken monorail at Garden terrace
State.Name: Nuka-World  - Fixes the East Entrance to Nuka-Town USA near Fizztop Mountain

Original.Name: MTM - Garden Terrace Ceiling Fixed By Monorail - ESL-40513-1-0-1565774992.7z

State.Author: MrTroubleMaker
State.Description:
Fixes the East Entrance to Nuka-Town USA near Fizztop Mountain



Bonus! 



Fixes the ceiling by the broken monorail at Garden terrace
State.Name: Nuka-World  - Fixes the East Entrance to Nuka-Town USA near Fizztop Mountain

State.Author: Sniper_Giova
State.Description:
A patch, compatible with UOF4, in which Nuka-Cola derivatives from Nuka World and Far Harbor work as intended with perks, math corrections and minor fixes.

Optionals: Chemist Radiation Damage fix and Ice Cold Drinks Quenches Thirst.
State.Name: NukaCola and Beverages Fix

State.Author: Sniper_Giova
State.Description:
A patch, compatible with UOF4, in which Nuka-Cola derivatives from Nuka World and Far Harbor work as intended with perks, math corrections and minor fixes.

Optionals: Chemist Radiation Damage fix and Ice Cold Drinks Quenches Thirst.
State.Name: NukaCola and Beverages Fix

State.Author: Lively
State.Description: FOMOD for patches between Whisper's Standalone Workbenches and Lively's Keyword Resource.
State.Name: Patches for Lively's Keywords Resource and Whisper's Standalone Workbenches

State.Author: spacefiddle
State.Description: Uses MCM to get around the Bethesda 8-slider limit, lets your mods save their volume slider positions between sessions. Also adds a Mute function for Vanilla sound channels, and Hotkeys built-in!
State.Name: Persistent Volume Sliders

State.Author: octodecoy
State.Description: Allows the power armor HUD to be switched based on equipped helmet, or lack of helmet. Currently supports the 5 base game power armor helmets and 37 mod added power armor helmets.
State.Name: Power Armor HUD Switcher

State.Author: IceKK
State.Description: Disabled Mouse Acceleration, Horizontal/Vertical Parity, Scalable ADS Multiplier, Normalized Sensitivity
State.Name: RAW INPUT - The Ultimate Mouse Sensitivity Fix

State.Author: Swyfter
State.Description: Minor fix to the water type mismatch near Westing Estate and WRVR.
State.Name: River Fix

State.Author: Seb263
State.Description: This mod fixes this annoying bug that makes the player's and NPCs faces turn brown when reloading a savegame. It is completely transparent, autonomous, has no impact on performance and is compatible with any mods.
State.Name: Rusty Face Fix

State.Author: Sharlikran
State.Description: Settlement Keywords expands on the current Settlement Menu system offering mod authors even more categories to use for their mods.
State.Name: Settlement Keywords Expanded

State.Author: cadpnq
State.Description: SMM provides an easy way to add custom menus and makes said menus automatically disappear on uninstall (without breaking your build menu!)
State.Name: Settlement Menu Manager

Original.Name: MTM - Slocum Joe Corporate HQ Reception Ceiling Fixed - ESL-40553-1-0-1565336678.7z

State.Author: MrTroubleMaker
State.Description:
Fixes the receptionist ceiling at Slocum Joe Corporate HQ



Bonus!



Fixes the Fens Parkview Apartment Wall
State.Name: Slocum Joe Corporate HQ Reception Ceiling Fixed

State.Author: Bourne
State.Description: Fallout 4 stutters when sprinting in first person. This is a workaround to the problem.
State.Name: Smooth First Person Sprint - Less Jerkiness and Stutter

State.Author: Whisper
State.Description: Adds 13 standalone custom workbenches to the Settlement build-menu. Designed as a modder's resource, used by my Craft Power Armor, Crafting Rearranged and Shipments Expanded mods.
State.Name: Standalone Workbenches

Original.Name: Underwater Glass Fix - ESL flagged ESP-58671-1-1-1647366687.7z

State.Author: Cv
State.Description: Fixes underwater car and vertibird glass showing envmap.
State.Name: Underwater Glass Fix

State.Author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

State.Author: radbeetle
State.Description: a liberal application of wd-40 and a wrench finally got Nick's jaw unstuck. check out the gifs in the mod description.
State.Name: Valentine Jaw Sync

State.Author: CreatyChameleon
State.Description: This mod simply restores the mildly completely broken GOAT sequence within Vault 81's class.
State.Name: Vault 81 - GOAT Sequence Patch

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FO4Edit is the Fallout 4 version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FO4Edit

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: clean all about CC from ur game interface
State.Name: CCCleaner

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Overhaul of all confirm box interfaces. Including different designs and styles for many box types (configurable). You can also choose to disable confirms, so it automatically accept without confirmation (like "Yes Im Sure"). Interface covers all languages.
State.Name: FallUI - Confirm Boxes (incl. Yes Im Sure)

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A whole new icon library with many fancy icons for usage in the FallUI mods. Including many customization settings.
State.Name: FallUI - Icon Library

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Overhaul of the Fallout 4 map. Added list of locations and workshops including text search. Add favorite locations to fast travel with one click. Many Quality-Of-Life features like disabling the popup on empty map space click, better map zoom steps, travel and arrival time. Colored marker support. Including high-res map texture support.
State.Name: FallUI - Map

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Better workbench interface optimized for PC. Bigger display size. Data columns. Comparision columns for mods. Item icon tag support. Icon menu for choosing your icon tag. Item subtitles. Autobuilding modules with zero cost. All languages included.
State.Name: FallUI - Workbench

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: octodecoy
State.Description: Allows the power armor HUD to be switched based on equipped helmet, or lack of helmet. Currently supports the 5 base game power armor helmets and 37 mod added power armor helmets.
State.Name: Power Armor HUD Switcher

Original.Name: PA Ownership Fix (with No PA Battery Pathing)-52315-1-0-1622200319.rar

State.Author: Selenarious
State.Description: When you take over a Power Armor that belonged to someone else and insert a fusion core, it will no longer be considered stolen! No .esp required.
State.Name: Power Armor Ownership Fix (no more stealing)

State.Author: Bilago
State.Description: Tweaks various INI settings with a few clicks!
State.Name: Fallout 4 Configuration Tool - By Bilago

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: The Complex Sorter from FallUI Item Sorter Mod. Automatically add item tags to all items. Highly versatile and completely configurable: custom processing rules, custom tag sets, custom naming rules. You can just change anything to your liking. Standard rules support most custom mods out-of-the-box.
State.Name: M8r98a4f2's Complex Item Sorter

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: Provides version independent IDs used for dynamically relocating offsets at runtime.
State.Name: Address Library for F4SE Plugins

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: A version independent F4SE plugin that expands the default size of ScrapHeap allocations.
State.Name: Baka ScrapHeap - Script Memory Limit Expander

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine
State.Name: Buffout 4

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: This mod adds new commands and overhauls existing commands within the console.
State.Name: Console Commands Extender

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description:
A F4SE plugin that allows you to disable the hardcoded, vision-obscuring shader effect at various workbenches so you can actually see what you're crafting.



Also allows you to change the shader effect for the Power Armor station and robot workbenches to a outline-only shader instead of a full shader.
State.Name: Crafting Highlight Fix

State.Author: Ea6t
State.Description: Allows encounter zone levels to be recalculated after initial entry.
State.Name: Encounter Zone Recalculation (Continuous Level Scaling)

State.Author: boring3
State.Description:
Make Fallout 4 always take most of CPU usage

Increase FPS and Prevent suddenly lag caused by other processes
State.Name: Fallout Priority - f4se plugin

Original.Name: FIS - The NEW FallUI Item Sorter-60580-2-1-1654350813.rar

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: The official new Item Sorter for the FallUI mods. Features auto-tagging, MCM-configurable categories and variations, many tags/icon, clear arranged overview and more!
State.Name: FIS - The NEW FallUI Item Sorter

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: Speeds up game start by storing INI files in memory instead of opening, parsing and closing the file each time some value from it is needed.
State.Name: PrivateProfileRedirector F4 - Faster game start (INI file cacher)

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Fixed crashes caused by Weapon Debris setting



Исправление вылетов при включенной настройке "Осколки от выстрелов"
State.Name: Weapon Debris Crash Fix

State.Author: TWFH1
State.Description: Fixes wire attach points on power conduits.
State.Name: Conduit Connection Fix

State.Author: The6thMessenger
State.Description: I FIX YOUR CRYOLATOR
State.Name: Cryolator Cryo-Cell Fix

State.Author: Kouta554
State.Description:
A really small fix for the glowing glass window that bothered me since i started playing this game. 

For now i just edited one file, so maybe there is still more to fix.

If i find more, i'll try to work on it and fix it.
State.Name: Glowing Glass Fix

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

State.Author: octodecoy
State.Description: Allows the power armor HUD to be switched based on equipped helmet, or lack of helmet. Currently supports the 5 base game power armor helmets and 37 mod added power armor helmets.
State.Name: Power Armor HUD Switcher

State.Author: Anime_Otaku102
State.Description: Fixes the direction of workshop lights in the Vault-Tec Workshop DLC.
State.Name: Vault-Tec Lights Mesh Fix

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Fixes an issue with texture overlapping on those Metal architecture roof pieces, it's a free to use modder's resource. Loose files zip archive for easy incorporation into your mod.
State.Name: Flickering Roof Mesh Fix

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

State.Author: Thanatos001
State.Description: Material fix for Novatron Torso
State.Name: Nuka World Novatron Assaultron Torso Fix

State.Author: Peasly Wellbott
State.Description: Fixes a horrible bug which can cause inappropriate reloading when transitioning from 1st person to 3rd person. Shoot and scoot in relative safety!
State.Name: 1st to 3rd Person Forced Reload Fix

Original.Name: Alex's Male First Person Camera Height Fix-27582-2-0.zip

State.Author: Alex me lol
State.Description: Adjust the eyeheight in first person if you play as a male character.
State.Name: Alex's Male First Person Camera Height Fix

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Vanilla NPC drinking animations are missing sounds and facial animations. This MOD fix this. For a little immersion.
State.Name: NPC Drinking Fix
